title: Ford plans comeback by restarting manufacturing plant in Tamil Nadu for global exports
description: Ford is planning a comeback in India by restarting its manufacturing plant in Tamil Nadu for exports. The company exited the Indian market in 2021 due to losses and low market share. Discussions with Tamil Nadu officials indicate a renewed focus on electric vehicles and sustainability, aiming to leverage India's growing auto market.
